summary.title: Summary
summary.desc: Detail-oriented Full-Stack Engineer with a strong foundation in both software development and logistics operations. Adept at designing and implementing scalable, maintainable web applications with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience. Proven track record of building robust front-end interfaces with modern frameworks like React and TypeScript, alongside secure and efficient back-end systems using Node.js, PostgreSQL, and RESTful APIs. Experienced in DevOps practices, CI/CD automation, and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about clean code, continuous learning, and delivering real-world value through technology.

dutyList.desc: Architected, developed, and deployed full-stack web applications tailored to small business needs, using TypeScript, React for frontend interfaces, Node.js, and PostgreSQL for backend services and data persistence.
value: Architected, developed, and deployed full-stack web applications tailored to small business needs, using TypeScript, React for frontend interfaces, Node.js, and PostgreSQL for backend services and data persistence.

dutyList.desc: Designed and implemented accessible, responsive UI components using Tailwind CSS, focusing on performance optimization across various devices, including mobile and low-powered hardware.
value: Designed and implemented accessible, responsive UI components using Tailwind CSS, focusing on performance optimization across various devices, including mobile and low-powered hardware.

dutyList.desc: Led a large-scale front-end migration from a legacy AngularJS codebase to modern React with TypeScript, significantly improving developer experience, reducing bugs, and modernizing the architecture for future scalability.
value: Led a large-scale front-end migration from a legacy AngularJS codebase to modern React with TypeScript, significantly improving developer experience, reducing bugs, and modernizing the architecture for future scalability.

dutyList.desc: Built and maintained internal developer tools, automated CI/CD workflows, and streamlined deployment pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker, reducing the average deployment time by over 40%.
value: Built and maintained internal developer tools, automated CI/CD workflows, and streamlined deployment pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker, reducing the average deployment time by over 40%.

dutyList.desc: Managed and optimized enterprise-level SQL databases, writing complex queries, stored procedures, and views to support real-time logistics analytics and reporting for internal and client-facing applications.
value: Managed and optimized enterprise-level SQL databases, writing complex queries, stored procedures, and views to support real-time logistics analytics and reporting for internal and client-facing applications.

dutyList.desc: Collaborated with software, hardware, and network teams to implement and test RESTful API integrations with warehouse systems, including barcode scanners, inventory modules, and RFID tracking devices.
value: Collaborated with software, hardware, and network teams to implement and test RESTful API integrations with warehouse systems, including barcode scanners, inventory modules, and RFID tracking devices.

dutyList.desc: Managed all aspects of daily café operations, including inventory tracking, team scheduling, customer conflict resolution, and ensuring consistent service delivery that resulted in a 4.8+ average customer rating.
value: Managed all aspects of daily café operations, including inventory tracking, team scheduling, customer conflict resolution, and ensuring consistent service delivery that resulted in a 4.8+ average customer rating.

dutyList.desc: Implemented scheduling and workflow improvements that cut labor costs by 12%, while maintaining peak-hour coverage and improving team morale through targeted training and leadership coaching.
value: Implemented scheduling and workflow improvements that cut labor costs by 12%, while maintaining peak-hour coverage and improving team morale through targeted training and leadership coaching.

dutyList.desc: Established and maintained a growing book of business across Arizona, New Mexico, and Nevada, securing high-value retail accounts and achieving consistent top-quartile sales performance over three years.
value: Established and maintained a growing book of business across Arizona, New Mexico, and Nevada, securing high-value retail accounts and achieving consistent top-quartile sales performance over three years.

dutyList.desc: Conducted detailed competitor analysis and local market research, adjusting pricing and promotional tactics based on region-specific trends to maximize client retention and penetration.
value: Conducted detailed competitor analysis and local market research, adjusting pricing and promotional tactics based on region-specific trends to maximize client retention and penetration.

projectList.name: StreamLine Docs
projectList.desc: Developed a documentation SaaS with markdown editing, user auth, and multi-tenant architecture.

projectList.name: ShopShack
projectList.desc: Built a feature-rich online storefront with real-time inventory sync and Stripe integration.

projectList.name: DevPath
projectList.desc: Created a roadmap tool for developers to track learning progress and share custom paths.

projectList.name: PortLite
projectList.desc: Designed a customizable portfolio template with support for dark mode and dynamic routing.

hobbyList.name: Building indie web apps for the whole world
value: Building indie web apps for the whole world

value: Sketching UI ideas for the present and future
